thread.title: Gabriella

author: Gabriella
title: Gabriella
text: I used many times Transferwise from UK to send money to Hungary which was working smoothly, usually 1 day, I sent money from Hungary to UK that was a little bit pain but i had to use Hungarian online Banking system to transfer money to transferwise after that was easy to get my money only have to wait 1 day. No matter how much money i am sending always fast , safety, and good rate also good communication with them.
